title: So raciss, MSNBC!
author: VD
content_html: This may be – in fact, it almost surely is – the most entertaining thing ever broadcast on MSBNC. I love the look on the black guy’s face when they go back to him. And is it just me, or was the Colonel in quasi-blackface there?
